tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BatteryStorage (
    battery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    storage_location VARCHAR(50),
    capacity FLOAT,
    performance_rating FLOAT,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE battery_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    battery_id INT,
    battery_level FLOAT,
    battery_temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE charging_station (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR,
    max_power FLOAT,
    status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE energy_usage (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    battery_id INT,
    energy_consumed FLOAT,
    charging_station_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE BatteryStorage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    capacity DECIMAL,
    state_of_charge DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE BatteryPerformance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    charge_rate DECIMAL,
    discharge_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyProduction (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    production_region VARCHAR(255),
    production_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE, 
    consumption_region VARCHAR(255),
    consumption_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE battery_performance (
    battery_id UUID,
    date DATE,
    performance_metric VARCHAR(255),
    value DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (battery_id, date)
);
